author: patrickl
msg: Correct URL for commons-digester nightly builds

author: costin
msg: I am totally lost with all the directories/build.properties/depenencies/jars.
I don't know if everyone else is as stupid as I am, but if so this
It builds everything that it can from source - with minimal indirections
Om my system ( 900MHz linux ) it builds all files ( 1058 ) in 19 secs
There are 11 jars that it needs.

author: costin
msg: Add properties for log4j ( if you build in 1.3 ) and jaxen/saxpath.
The last 2 are needed by taglibs which is required by jasper2.
( the files are checked in taglibs )

author: patrickl
msg: Require use of Xerces 2.0.1 since I found that it does support XML schemas without throwing a StockOverflow exception. Previously, I thought that only the HEAD branch of Xerces 2 fixed this problem.

author: patrickl
msg: Updated build instructions, build.properties, and download target to use the latest Xerces 2 nightly build since it is the official Xerces 2 releases do not support XML schemas properly. Thanks go to Jean-Francois Arcand for helping find a parser that handles XML schemas properly.
